column5: Safe neighborhood ONLY 4 miles away from downtown San Antonio Close to: I-10, 90, and I-35.  San Antonio Convention Center Hemisfare - -Tower of Americas Alamo and the Missions Riverwalk, Blue Star Art District, King William District,  Pearl Brewery and zoo.  It's a quick jump on the freeway to Lackland Base.   Public transportation is only half a block from the house. Please READ HOUSE RULES BEFORE instant booking. LGBT friendly.
column8: Want a GREAT Stay? Close to downtown tourist spots
